resources.string: Customize your preferences to suit your schedule
Earn badges and level up as a volunteer
There will be a volunteering event on your screen every time. Simply swipe right if you wish to join or swipe left to pass and a new event will come up on your screen.
You can chat with the organizers on the chats page to enquire more about the details of events.
Edit your profile page to filter out the cause you would like to volunteer for or the location of events.
The more events you volunteer for, the higher the ranking of your badge.
